job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Happy ReturnsltbrgtltbrgtOur mission is to make returns beautiful for shoppers retailers and the planetwhich we do through our unique combination of proprietary software and reverse logistics We invented 3rdparty boxfree inperson returns like you now see at Amazon to Kohls and we provide the only endtoend returns solution for digitallynative and omnichannel retailers that is not only delightful for customers our lifetime Net Promoter Score is 94 on millions of returns but also saves money for retailers and is better for the planetltbrgtltbrgtWe are solving the 1 pain point in ecommerce and having a lot of fun doing it Join our passionate fastgrowing team and help us transform the landscape of online shoppingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt As a Software Engineer You Will ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtTake ownership of the successful implementation and delivery of new features and projects using a variety of modern languages and frameworks such as Golang TypeScript React and PostgreSQLltligtltligtActively participate in system architecture discussions and technical design reviews to ensure the scalability reliability and security of the Happy Returns systemltligtltligtEnforce clean code and excellent coding practices by conducting thoughtful code reviewsltligtltligtActively participate in biweekly engineering lunch ampamp learns to promote continuous growth and knowledge sharingltligtltligtCollaborate closely with Product Managers to meet and exceed customer needs in the simplest possible waysltligtltligtHelp us build and maintain a world class technology system so we can achieve our mission of making returns beautiful for Shoppers Retailers and the Planetltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt We Are Looking For Someone Who Has ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt1 years of experience in web application developmentltligtltligtExperience designing implementing and testing REST APIsltligtltligtThe ability to efficiently ship clean maintainable and well tested codeltligtltligtA strong interest in joining a highly collaborative environment and working daily with Product Managers DevOps and QA Engineersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt Bonus Points If You Have ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt1 years of experience developing and testing web applications end to endltligtltligtExpertise in multiple serverside languages such as Go or PythonltligtltligtProficiency in one or more modern JavaScript frameworks such as ReactltligtltligtFamiliarity with database technology such as PostgreSQL MySQL and MongoDBltligtltligtExperience with Docker Kubernetes and AWSltligtltligtInterest in ecommerce logistics andor sustainabilityltligtltulgtDiversity of Experience and PerspectiveltbrgtltbrgtAt Happy Returns were looking for people with passion grit and integrity We encourage you to apply even if your experience doesnt exactly match the job description Your skills and passion will stand out and set you apart We welcome diverse perspectives and people who think rigorously and arent afraid to challenge assumptions Join us
